posts.name: Yohan Behaghel
posts.cooked: Hey guys, I can’t find these screws dimensions, does anyone have it ? VEXpro Ball Shifter Hardware Kit - VEX Robotics Thanks guys Team 5553 from France

posts.name: Skye Leake
posts.cooked:
Dang that’s a shame they do not have the components listed, they should. Eyeball sas they should be 8-32s and 10-24 threads. But I could be wrong, not sure on length.

The ball shifter assembly instructions will have the part call outs (under docs and downloads) this will take a little bit of sifting through the .pdf

https://www.vexrobotics.com/3cimballshifter.html#attr-vex_docs_downloads

posts.name: silverD
posts.cooked: Is this for the 2 or 3 cim version?  3rd stage?

posts.name: Yohan Behaghel
posts.cooked: ok i’ll go and see thanks

posts.name: Yohan Behaghel
posts.cooked: well actually i’m trying to find the right screws dimensions for ball shifter shafts : Ball Shifter Short Output Shaft v2 - VEX Robotics

posts.name: Yohan Behaghel
posts.cooked: yeah but can you find it there ? I personally don’t

posts.name: topgun
posts.cooked: If you are talking the output shaft that takes a 1/4-20  .500" long.
